original: If my brother were here, he would know what to do.
translated: Si mon frère était là, il saurait quoi faire.

original: I don't consider Tom a friend.
translated: Je ne considère pas Tom comme un ami.

original: We know it was you that broke the window.
translated: On sait que c'est toi qui as cassé la fenêtre.

original: I returned home by train.
translated: Je suis rentré chez moi en train.

original: They caught him playing a trick on his sister.
translated: Ils le prirent en train de faire une farce à sa sœur.

original: That's a lot of cash.
translated: C'est beaucoup d'argent liquide.

original: You must not come in.
translated: Tu ne dois pas entrer.

original: We'll miss living in Boston.
translated: Vivre à Boston nous manquera.

original: Didn't you hear your name called?
translated: N'avez-vous pas entendu appeler votre nom ?

original: He lives in a big city in the south of Spain.
translated: Il habite une grande ville dans le sud de l'Espagne.

original: Can I see some ID?
translated: Puis-je voir une pièce d'identité ?

original: Let Tom do his job.
translated: Laissez Tom faire son travail.

original: We tend to make mistakes.
translated: Nous avons tendance à faire des erreurs.

original: Because you sell it.
translated: Parce que vous le vendez.

original: Who's your girlfriend?
translated: Qui est ta petite amie ?

original: There's no stopping now.
translated: On ne peut pas l'arrêter, maintenant.

original: She is still a girl.
translated: Elle est encore mineure.

original: Do you know how to do it?
translated: Sais-tu comment le faire ?

original: I should have told you before.
translated: J'aurais dû vous le dire auparavant.

original: What a shame to just endure life rather than enjoying it.
translated: Quel dommage de ne faire que supporter la vie plutôt que d'en jouir !

original: What a mess!
translated: Quel bordel !

original: I have a small favor to ask of you.
translated: J'ai une petite faveur à vous demander.

original: Boys have their own bikes these days.
translated: De nos jours, les garçons ont leur propre vélo.

original: How much is it including insurance and tax?
translated: C'est combien, taxe et assurance incluses ?

original: You're excused.
translated: Tu es excusée.

original: Pay attention to priority!
translated: Attention à la priorité !

original: Can I have a few minutes, please?
translated: Puis-je avoir quelques minutes, je vous prie ?

original: They all changed.
translated: Elles ont toutes changé.

original: Any amount of money will be welcome.
translated: N'importe quelle somme d'argent sera la bienvenue.

original: Such a proposal would only be turned down immediately.
translated: Une proposition pareille ne serait que rejetée aussitôt.

original: I didn't tell her everything.
translated: Je ne lui ai pas tout dit.

original: We can't go anywhere today.
translated: Nous ne pouvons aller nulle part aujourd'hui.

original: He bought a VIP pass.
translated: Il a acheté un sauf-conduit pour personnalité.

original: That's twenty dollars off your pay.
translated: C'est vingt dollars en déduction de ta paie.

original: Love is to be regarded as the very spirit of life.
translated: L'amour doit être regardé comme le souffle même de la vie.

original: He wrote a letter yesterday.
translated: Il a écrit une lettre hier.

original: Do you want me to go now?
translated: Veux-tu que j'y aille maintenant ?

original: We all need to work together.
translated: Nous avons tous besoin de travailler ensemble.

original: My tailor specialises in men's bespoke suits.
translated: Mon tailleur est spécialisé dans les costumes sur mesure pour hommes.

original: I'm nearly blind.
translated: Je suis presque aveugle.

original: I hate football.
translated: Je déteste le football.

original: Take care!
translated: Faites attention.

original: Why are you running?
translated: Pourquoi est-ce que tu cours ?

original: I accused him of cheating.
translated: Je l'ai accusé de tricher.

original: Maciek died in December.
translated: Maciek est mort en décembre.

original: I just want to let you know that I think you're the most beautiful woman that I've ever seen.
translated: Je veux juste que tu saches que je pense que tu es la plus belle femme que j'ai jamais vue.

original: I was hit by a car.
translated: J’ai été heurté par une voiture.

original: Congratulations.
translated: Toutes mes félicitations !

original: Come down.
translated: Descendez.

original: I'm familiar with this neighborhood.
translated: Je connais ce quartier.

original: The store is well stocked.
translated: Le magasin est bien approvisionné.
